attributes.action: We demand a Safety Moratorium on 5G by Independent scientists prior to roll-out.
attributes.additional_details:
NO published scientific study has yet explored the biological effects of complex, multi-frequency radiation exposure on humanity.  236 scientists from 41 countries have now expressed serious concerns about huge EMF exposure on our entire world, please see: http://bit.ly/2jylC6c

Citizens in supposedly 'democratic' countries are being knowingly, openly and progressively harmed by technology service-providers, industry and all levels of government.  

With 5G, there will be NO safe place to live!
attributes.background: We are energetic ‘vibrational’ beings.  5G will substantially increase our exposure to radio-frequency electromagnetic fields (RF-EMF) on top of the 2G, 3G, 4G, Wi-Fi etc for telecommunications that are already in place.  RF-EMF has already been proven to be harmful for humans and the environment.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition asking the Government or Parliament to commission and fund an independent inquiry into the safety of mobile internet signals.
